TopicTitle: I introduced a local band to KSP!

Articles.Content:
I came across a local band that uses NASA imagery and themes for their live performances. Perilune is a new indie electronica band showcasing experimental "space grooves" that I thought would be perfect for KSP.

I met up with the band on their 15th September live performance in Singapore and some of the audience too are fans of KSP! 

They were happy with my offer to make a KSP video montage featuring their music, and put up the entire recording of their live performance on Soundcloud as well.

What do you think?
Oddly satisfying... The music went really well with the game play

Very cool! 

Its nice to see people spread Kerbal Space Program around!
Soon after I started promoting them, this band landed a gig at the Blade Runner 2049 premiere. It was great
